Name: LoL Companion
Author: Desstroct

Actions.Name: Game Status
Actions.Tooltip: Shows the current League of Legends client state (Lobby, Queue, Champ Select, In Game, etc.)

Actions.Name: Lobby Scanner
Actions.Tooltip: Displays player info during champion select (champion, rank, win rate). On dial: rotate to cycle players.

Actions.Name: Jungle Path
Actions.Tooltip: Shows the recommended jungle clear path based on your champion and map side. Dial: rotate to scroll camps, press to switch path variant.

Actions.Name: KDA Tracker
Actions.Tooltip: Live KDA, CS/min and gold display during game. Rich dashboard on dial touch strip.

Actions.Name: Auto Accept
Actions.Tooltip: Automatically accept match ready check. Press to toggle on/off.

Actions.Name: Smart Pick
Actions.Tooltip: Suggests counter picks or best overall picks. Press to toggle mode. Dial: rotate to scroll picks, press to toggle counter/best mode.

Actions.Name: Lobby Level
Actions.Tooltip: Shows average summoner level during champion select. Useful to gauge lobby experience.

Actions.Name: Auto Rune
Actions.Tooltip: Automatically sets optimal runes from Lolalytics when you lock a champion. Dial: rotate to switch build, press/touch to apply.

Actions.Name: Best Item
Actions.Tooltip: Recommends the next item to buy based on your champion, lane, and current gold. Dial: rotate to browse full build.

Actions.Name: Death Timer
Actions.Tooltip: Shows your respawn countdown when you die in-game. Shows ALIVE status with level when alive.

Actions.Name: Auto Pick/Ban
Actions.Tooltip: Automatically picks and bans your preferred champions during Champion Select. Press to toggle on/off.

Actions.Name: LP Tracker
Actions.Tooltip: Shows your current rank, LP, win rate, and session LP changes. Rotate dial or press key to switch between Solo/Duo and Flex.

Actions.Name: Skill Order
Actions.Tooltip: Shows the recommended skill max order and level-by-level skill priority during Champion Select. Data from Lolalytics.

Description:
League of Legends companion for Stream Deck. Monitor your game status, track your rank and LP gains, and get real-time stats on your keys and dials.

Features:
• Game Status — See your current client state (Lobby, Queue, Champion Select, In Game)
• LP Tracker — Track your rank, LP, win rate, and session gains across Solo/Duo and Flex
• Auto Accept — Automatically accept the match ready check
• Lobby Scanner — View player ranks and win rates during Champion Select
• Smart Pick — Get data-driven champion recommendations and counter picks
• Auto Rune — Automatically import optimal rune pages and summoner spells when you lock in a champion
• Skill Order — Shows the recommended skill max order during Champion Select
• Auto Pick/Ban — Pre-configure picks and bans for instant selection
• KDA Tracker — Live K/D/A, CS/min, and gold display during games
• Best Item — See your recommended next item purchase based on champion and gold
• Death Timer — Respawn countdown on your Stream Deck
• Jungle Path — Recommended jungle clear paths for your champion

Supports Stream Deck keys and dials (SD+). Requires the League of Legends client to be running. Data sourced from the official Riot Live Client API and public champion statistics.
